title: Crossroad 2014 DVDR R4 NTSC NDSP
description:
Consumed by a thirst for vengeance, Michael ( Philip Bulcock ) is about to meet Clef ( Sean Galuszka ) , the man who brutally , took the life of his beloved wife and his innocent daughter six years ago . Deciding to go to the last consequences , make an appointment at a diner with the killer who destroyed his family.

However , an attempted robbery can derail your plans and endanger the lives of everyone present . But , in an incredible way , Michael takes control of the situation and reveals the real reason for being in that place. Right now , people confined there realize that , somehow , their lives are connected as a network , bringing up startling revelations . But suddenly , Michael realizes that , in the sights of his gun , he is responsible for all your pain and suffering. Now comes the moment of truth . Amid these findings , it remains the difficult choice : Shoot or forgive. What would you do ?
